definitions.definition: A pressing; a force applied to a surface.
definitions.example: Apply pressure to the wound to stop the bleeding.

definitions.definition: A contrasting force or impulse of any kind
definitions.example: the pressure of poverty; the pressure of taxes; the pressure of motives on the mind; the pressure of civilization.
She has felt pressure lately because her boss expects her to get the job done by the first.

definitions.definition: The amount of force that is applied over a given area divided by the size of this area.
To encourage or heavily exert force or influence.
definitions.example: Do not let anyone pressure you into buying something you do not want.
